FORM 10-K

Small Company Inc.

PART I

Item 1A: Risk Factors

The Company faces risks related to its limited operating history and the challenges of scaling its business operations. As a smaller company, we may have limited resources to respond to competitive pressures or market changes.

We depend on a small number of key customers for a significant portion of our revenue. The loss of any major customer could materially adversely affect our financial results.

Item 1B. Unresolved Staff Comments

Not applicable.
